downloadTitle: Microsoft Dynamics CRM 4.0 E-mail Router Readme (On-Premise and Microsoft Dynamics CRM  4.0 Service Provider Editions)
downloadDescription: This document provides important late-breaking information for the Microsoft Dynamics CRM 4.0 E-mail Router (on-premise and Microsoft Dynamics CRM  4.0 Service Provider editions).
detailsSection:
The Microsoft Dynamics CRM 4.0 E-mail Router Readme contains important late-breaking information about the Microsoft Dynamics CRM 4.0 E-mail Router that supplements the Microsoft Dynamics CRM documentation.

The E-mail Router is an interface between the Microsoft Dynamics CRM system and one or more Exchange servers or POP3 servers for incoming e-mail, and one or more SMTP servers for outgoing e-mail. E-mail messages come into the Microsoft Dynamics CRM system through the E-mail Router.


The three main components that can be installed during E-mail Router Setup are as follows:
  • Microsoft Dynamics CRM E-mail Router Service
  • Microsoft Dynamics CRM E-mail Configuration Manager
  • Microsoft Dynamics CRM E-mail Rule Deployment Wizard


Important: If you are using Microsoft Dynamics CRM Online, download and read the release version of the Microsoft Dynamics CRM Online E-mail Router Release Notes.
systemRequirementsSection:
Other Requirements:
  • Internet Browser application, such as Microsoft Internet Explorer.
installInstructionSection:
1. To start the download, click Download.

  2. If the File Download dialog box appears, do one of the following:


    • To start the download immediately, click Open.
    • To copy the download to your computer to view at a later time, click Save.
